histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.Image.Invalidity
histogram.summary: Measures the fraction of invalid images per thousand images, in ten minute blocks. This will be recorded only when an HPS feature is enabled and at least 30 images are inferenced.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.QuickDim.Enabled
histogram.summary: Records when users change the kQuickDim setting on the privacy page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.SnoopingProtection.Enabled
histogram.summary: Records when users change the kSnoopingProtectionEnabled setting on the privacy page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.SnoopingProtection.FlakeyDetection
histogram.summary: Records when a potentially-flakey negative signal appears for snooping protection. We may also log flakey positive signals in future.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.SnoopingProtection.{Result}.Duration
histogram.summary: Measures the time of the SnoopingProction at the {Result} state. Recorded when the snooping status changes.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.SnoopingProtectionNotificationSuppression.Enabled
histogram.summary: Records the new setting of kSnoopingProtectionNotificationSuppressionEnabled when users change it on the privacy page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.TurnOn.Result
histogram.summary: Reports the result of each attempt to turn the hps device on.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.TurnOn.{Result}.Duration
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took to turn on the device, when the result was {Result}.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.HPS.Update.{Stage}.Duration
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took to send an {Stage} update.
